annotation.name: org.gtk.EggDBus.DocString
annotation.value: All D-Bus objects are supposed to implement the #org.freedesktop.DBus.Peer D-Bus interface. The interface is designed to be a minimal interface for checking whether the other end is reachable and, if so, what machine hosts the object.

annotation.name: org.gtk.EggDBus.DocString
annotation.value: A method used to diagnose whether an object is reachable.

annotation.name: org.gtk.EggDBus.DocString
annotation.value: Gets the Machine UUID of the machine hosting the object.

annotation.name: org.gtk.EggDBus.DocString
annotation.value: A Universally Unique Identifier for the machine hosting the object. See the D-Bus specification for more information about D-Bus UUIDs.
